column5: Looking for some trolling mounts for my bass boat without any drilling and same accross this site:  http://www.extremefishingconcepts.com/bases.html  Anyone have any experience?
They don't look too solid at all. If you just want to put the rod down to grab a gweech maybe ok. Again, just my uneducated opinion.

Looks scary to me also I use a seat pole that fits into the socket and welded 2 rod holders on a plate for my trolling rig.        BTW the J hook on the bottomside will damage the fiberglass it has almost no surface area to spread the load.  Art
